Name: 快乐蓝熊HappyBlueBear
About the game: Happy Blue Bear is a platformer game with adventurous jumping. Developers “handmade” all levels, hope to make you feel relaxed and at ease while playing it. This is a very positive and inspiring adventure game. The story is about a blue bear, whom is the doctor of the animal world. He travels around trying to help his animal friends. He conquers all difficulties, eventually finds the cure and precious medicines to save his friends. Blue bear is always happy and energetic, that’s why his friends call him “Happy blue Bear”. It’s full of fun! ·Original relaxing background music. ·Bright colors, cutesy images. ·Easy to use and very additive, in a good way! ·Traditional Chinese cultural elements, such as red lanterns and Spring Couplets. ·Unexpected mystery and riddles! P.S．If you keep pressing and drag left key on your mouse, there is a little surprise!
